title: 'The Morning Show' S2E2 Recap
description:
Bill Simmons and Amanda Dobbins rejoin to discuss the Apple TV+ show that continues to perplex and madden, 'The Morning Show.'
Hosts: Bill Simmons and Amanda Dobbins
Producer: Steve Ahlman
